isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - RADIATOR, REMOVE AND REPLACE - RADIATOR and Component INSTALLation - SURGE TANK

svcproc.title: SURGE TANK
svcproc.para: Check the condition of surge tank for leaks or damage before installing.

step1.para: Locate surge tank on radiator top frame and install upper mounting bolts.
Align lower mounting holes in surge tank with holes in radiator side frame.
Re-attach the surge tank sensor plug in the surge tank receptacle.
Attach the surge over flow hose and clamp.
Close the pet cock in lower radiator.
Replace coolant after all other installations have been completed.

When all other installations, surge tank and related components, including charge air cooler pipes and clamps are installed, start engine and check for leaks. If leaks appear, apply more heat to the clamps.
